mapper.insert: INSERT INTO prod_cate (cate_cd, main_cate, main_name, med_name, use_yn, REMARK, FST_REG, FST_REGR, LAST_UPD, LAST_UPDR) VALUES (#{cateCd}, TRUNC(#{cateCd},-2) , (select cm.main_name from prod_cate pc, cate_main cm where pc.main_cate = cm.main_cate AND pc.cate_cd = #{cateCd}) , #{medName}, #{useYn}, #{remark}, #{fstReg}, #{fstRegr}, #{lastUpd}, #{lastUpdr})
mapper.update: UPDATE prod_cate SET main_name = #{mainName}, med_name = #{medName}, use_yn = #{useYn}, REMARK = #{remark}, FST_REG = #{fstReg}, FST_REGR = #{fstRegr}, LAST_UPD = #{lastUpd}, LAST_UPDR = #{lastUpdr} WHERE cate_cd = #{cateCd}
